Home > Vol 4, No 1 (2015)

Computer Engineering and Applications Journal

ComEngApp-Journal (Collaboration between University of Sriwijaya, Kirklareli University and IAES) is a center for supporting distinguished scholars and students who are researching various areas of Computer Engineering and its applications. This Journal is an open access journal that provides online publication (three times a year) of articles in all areas of the subject in computer engineering and application. ComEngApp-Journal wishes to provide good chances for academic and industry professionals to discuss recent progress in various areas of Computer Engineering and its applications.

Kindly please download the template DOC & LaTeX of the ComEngApp-Journal

Submit your manuscripts today!
The ComEngApp-Journal is published on February, June and October

Provided by:
Department of Computer Engineering, Faculty of Computer Science, Universitas Sriwijaya, Indonesia
Department of Electrical & Electronics Engineering, Faculty of Engineering, Kirklareli University, Turkey
Institute of Advanced Engineering and Science (IAES)
e-mail: comengapp@gmail.com / comengapp@unsri.ac.id

Call For Papers

  

The Computer Engineering and Application Journal (ComEngApp-Journal) is an open access journal that provides online publication (three times a year) of articles in all areas of the subject in computer engineering and application.

The Journal welcomes the submission of manuscripts that meet the general criteria of significance and scientific excellence. Papers will be published approximately one month after acceptance. All articles published in ComEngApp-Journal will be peer-reviewed.

The main topics include but will not be limited to:

  1. Communication and Networking
  2. Computer Science & Informatics
  3. Ubiquitous Multimedia Computing
  4. Security Technology and Information Assurance
  5. Robotics, Control and Automation
  6. Signal Processing, Image Processing and Pattern Recognition
  7. Grid and Distributed Computing

ComEngApp Journal is published three times per year (February, June and September).

All paper must be submitted online via online system and follow author guideline (DOC / LaTeX). If you have any problems, please contact : comengapp@gmail.com / comengapp@unsri.ac.id

 

Editor-in-chief

Prof. Dr. Ir. Siti Nurmaini

  
Posted: 2013-10-13
